ygData.msgSnippet: Im using a: Tattered Mantle LORE ITEM MAGIC ITEM AC: +12 Disease Resist: +10 HP: +20 Weight: 4.5 from Gullerback in BW Musiker, bertox

LORE ITEM MAGIC ITEM
AC: +12 Disease Resist: +10 HP: +20
Weight: 4.5
